text: Oh thatâ€™s nice, is it better to be outside of London do you think? I saw u worked at Cinecite too, was it a fun experience there?
Personally I prefer Bournemouth, but I know quite a few artists here who prefer London. It was good experience there too. I started as a runner and moved up to FX from there
Do you know where you'd like to work? Or what area of Env stuff you'd like to do?

I would love to work for the environment department in DNEG! Really like the work they do, basically any tv/VFX or commercial, just wanna make quality content and work with good team! (: cinecite would be amazing, I visited their office once and it looks really pretty and a nice environment!
